thread.section_title: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very good choice
thread.title_full: A very good choice - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Eli N
title: A very good choice
text:
Excellent value for money
Location is brilliant, room size is very decent and staying at a top floor will ensure a beautiful view of the city. The room was clean and the service was great and friendly.
Their rooftop bar has beautiful view and the the bartender definitely knows his job.
The lobby on the other hand is small and really does not cater for business meetings so if you are looking for it you should look elsewhere.
